pr_title: SQL: Remove constant_keyword from SQL docs

timeline.message:
Remove constant_keyword from SQL docs

`constant_keyword` removed as distinct type from SQL in #60524.

timeline.bodyText:
Does the SQL keyword type now refer to all types in the keyword family? If so, I would also make this change:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            | <<keyword, `keyword`>>                   | keyword         | VARCHAR     | 32,766
          
          
            
            | <<keyword, keyword type family>>         | keyword         | VARCHAR     | 32,766
timeline.author: jrodewig
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -24,7 +24,6 @@ s|SQL precision
 | <<number, `half_float`>>                 | half_float      | FLOAT       | 3
 | <<number, `scaled_float`>>               | scaled_float    | DOUBLE      | 15
 | <<keyword, `keyword`>>                   | keyword         | VARCHAR     | 32,766

replies.bodyText: Thanks, @jrodewig, that's a good suggestion, since yes, all types in that family will now be reported as keyword.
replies.author: bpintea
